p: Unfortunately, our study excluded approximately 40% of the total screened medical records, and of these cases, 81.7% were due to the simple absence of a creatinine investigation. These patients might not have shown signs of AKI during hospitalization, and therefore, clinicians did not send these patients for creatinine analyses. Similarly, other studies excluded as low as 5% and up to 74% of patients due to the absence of creatinine results [ 7, 15].
